Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Preferably \Pref"er*a*bly\, adv. In preference; by choice. [1913 Webster]
To choose Plautus preferably to Terence. --Dennis. [1913 Webster]
preferably adv : more readily or willingly; "clean it well, preferably with warm water"; "I'd rather be in Philadelphia"; "I'd sooner die than give up" [syn: {sooner}, {rather}]
